Selecting Different View Configurations

If you are doing a series of comparisons with the View Comparison utility, you can compare two views from two different projects on the same server configuration or two views in the same project with different view configurations.

You can even compare a prior view configuration with the current configuration. However, only views with a current configuration can be changed, because you cannot change the past. For example, if you roll the target view back to an earlier time, you can merge only to the source view.

To change the source view (or the target view):

  1. Select the source or target pane that you want to change.

  2. Do one of the following:

    • From the View or context menu, select Change Project/View to select a view from a different project.

    • From the View or context menu, highlight Select View to choose a different view from the same project.

To roll back a view:

  1. Select the source or target pane that you want to change.

  2. From the View or context menu, highlight Select Configuration and choose a Label configuration, Promotion state configuration, or Configuration as of  (specific date and time).

  3. Click OK.

To restore a rolled back view:

  1. Select the source or target pane that you want to change.

  2. From the View or context menu, highlight Select Configuration, and click the Current configuration option.

  3. Click OK.
